author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/lost-soul-aside/

Simple to grasp, challenging to perfect. 
In Lost Soul Aside™, you have total freedom to fight your way; switching weapons, mixing attack patterns and learning your enemy’s movements in adrenaline-pumping battles charged with spectacular visual effects.

Available August 29, on PS5® console and PC. 
Pre-order now for in-game bonuses.

#ps5 #ps5games #PC #LostSoulAside
title: Lost Soul Aside - Weapons Trailer | PS5 & PC Games
